data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morrow, Christine, Allcock, Louise A., Mccormack, Grace (2018): A new species of Hymeraphia Bowerbank, 1864 (Axinellida: Raspailiidae) from a deep-water canyon southwest off Ireland. Zootaxa 4466 (1): 61-68, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4466.1.7
